column4: i have a problem with ubuntu 10.10. When i try to open nautilus with an icon from the panel, it opens the VLC player and not nautilus. The path set for the nautilus starter is: file:///home/phil/
where do i set that file:/// opens with nautilus and not with vlc player?
open nautilus, right click on a directory -> open with
yeah it's some weird bug, every couple of days I see that question
